DOC.brief_summary: The investigator hypothesize positive end expiratory pressure ( PEEP ) would increase regional oxygen saturation ( rSO2 ) .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Positive End Expiratory Pressure ( PEEP ) Cerebral Oxymetry During Laparoscopy
DOC.detailed_description: The investigator hypothesize PEEP would increase rSO2 laparoscopic surgery improve oxygenation .
DOC.criteria: ASA PS I II adult patient undergo laparoscopic low anterior resection Trendelenburg position Patients history cerebrovascular disease , coronary occlusive disease and/or obesity ( body mass index > 30 ) exclude study .
